description: To provide a scholarship to a current UCO student who meets the following criteria: Eligibility Complete the UCO Qualifying Application Must be enrolled full-time Must be an Edmond North High School graduate Undergraduate student- sophomore or above Preference is given to a Journalism major Recipient Requirements Write a thank you note for the scholarship donor Attend a meeting at Paycom and tour facilities The scholarship is available during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
